remarks: The product of a unit and an irreducible element is irreducible. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2014.)
statement:
irredn0.i $e |- I = ( Irred ` R ) $.
irredrmul.u $e |- U = ( Unit ` R ) $.
irredrmul.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
irredlmul $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. U /\ Y e. I ) -> ( X .x. Y ) e. I ) $.
